message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $90. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $80?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'm willing to compromise at $85. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time at $82.50. Can you consider that?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'm willing to compromise at $84.50. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $84.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time at $82. I think that's a fair price for this product. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I think the product's value is worth at least $83.50. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, Alice, but $83.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time at $81.75. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?

I understand that we're getting close to the end, Bob, but I'm not willing to compromise further. I think the product's value is worth at least $83. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
